title: Summer School 2020 Dev
description: Join the commuity, learn new things!
keywords: event, mittaltech, website, summer, events, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev, hyderabad, school, training
cachingComplete: Caching complete! Future visits will work offline.
newVersionAvailable: A new version of this app is available.
subscribeNote: No spam, only the latest news and updates!

featuredSessions.description2: This Summer , Mittal Technologies presents you a wide range of courses being conducted by summer school  to make your summer worth enjoyable.
featuredSessions.description3: In this campaign , you would be learning about the courses with which you can explore more in your field interest which would be a way more fun learning because of the hands-on learning one would experience in this workshop.
featuredSessions.description4: The courses provided by the summer school  that can be categorized into the technical and non-technical domains. The technical domain includes all the latest technologies which are in boom presently.All the tech geeks can utilize this opportunity by opting the course in the field of your interest
featuredSessions.description5: The courses provided in the Technical domain are block chain , internet of things(Iot) , Android Development , Ethical Hacking , competitive programming , MS office and also the Programming Languages namely Java and Python
featuredSessions.description6: All the creative minds ,  that are not in the technical side but are passionate enough to accomplish their goals , can opt for the courses provided in non-technical domain .
featuredSessions.description7: The courses offered in this domain include Animation-VFX , Digital Marketing , Music , Photography , Graphic designing Photoshop and android app design.
featuredSessions.description8: So guys, get ready to make this summer filled with loads of fun and excitement by exploring the latest technologies provided by summer school . Register soon and utilize this opportunity of yours to make your vacations worth enjoyable because learning is growing.
featuredSessions.label: Explore all featured sessions

howItWas.description: Described by many as 'Google I/O of Ukraine', our team creates DevFest to be the best place for experience sharing in a phenomenal atmosphere.
howItWas.label: See how it was in 2016

ticketsBlock.ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks, lunch and party. Accommodation is NOT included in the ticket price.

team.description:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps' and communicating in 'gmail'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

[Google Developers Group (GDG) Lviv](http://lviv.gdg.org.ua/) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion.

Our goal is to organize space to connect the best industry experts with Ukrainian audience to boost development of IT.

feedback.headline: Review session

blocks.title: Organizer
blocks.description: GDG Lviv with support of 10 GDGs from all around Ukraine is proud organizer of DevFest Ukraine

blocks.title: What is a GDG?
blocks.description: A Google Developer Group is a community of volunteers who create exciting projects and share experiences about Google technologies.

blocks.title: What is DevFest?
blocks.description: DevFests are community-led developer events hosted by Google Developer Groups around the globe.
